title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 155.1 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 155.1 - Definition

State Regulations

The term restricted highway when used in this Part shall
mean any highway or portion thereof under construction or reconstruction under
the supervision of the Commissioner of Transportation, and which is designated
by the commissioner as a restricted highway pursuant to section
104-a
of the

Highway Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
155.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
